About me

General

I am a trans woman with a passion for developing web pages. My interest in them arose from just how instrumental the web has been to my development as a person, and to just how fascinating and unique it is a technology - from it's inception as the telephone line, to the massive, world-wide communications network it has become today. I believe every single person needs a webpage, and I am the one to provide it.

Education

I attended the technical university of Sofia with a bachelors of Computer Science for 4 years, of which I completed 3 successfully. Beyond that, I've tried to read, study, and engage with the community as much as I could to further supplement my skills. I feel that I am reaching the point where I cannot progress as far on my own, and am thus looking to join an organisation interested in helping me grow and progress as a developer.

Work Experience

I worked for two years at a data center in my home country, before I had to interrupt my work and studies to move abroad and support my partner as she struggled with health issues. Now that her health is recuperating, I am eager to rejoin the work force and start my very own career!

workflow

My approach to solutions

1

Understand the problem

Think deeply about the need this particular project or task seeks to fulfill, look for already present solutions and how they are accomplished, get inspired.

2

Make a plan

Type down everything that I can, from design and the corresponding patterns, to the techonologies used and any other relevant information.

3

Work dilligently

Implement until I have hit the plan specifications, or there is a need for me to pause and reasses, making sure not to leave any sloppy work behind.

4

Re-asses

Take a step back and consider the bigger picture. Is the project finished? Way to go! Is there a problem? Go back to step 1.
